name: Howrah Junction
desc: One of India's busiest railway stations, iconic for its historic architecture.

name: Sealdah Station
desc: Major suburban and long-distance railway station in Kolkata.

name: Kolkata Chitpur Terminal
desc: Known as Kolkata Railway Station, handles long-distance express trains.

name: Santragachi Junction
desc: Another important junction station for South Eastern Railway zone.

name: Shalimar Station
desc: Handles selected express trains, quieter alternative to Howrah.

name: Dum Dum Junction
desc: Key junction connecting suburban trains and Kolkata Metro.

name: Ballygunge Junction
desc: Important suburban railway station in South Kolkata.

name: Bidhan Nagar Road
desc: Serves Salt Lake area, part of Kolkata suburban network.

name: Princep Ghat Station
desc: Scenic station near Hooghly riverfront, popular for local train rides.

name: Park Circus Station
desc: Busy local station connecting South & Central Kolkata.
